title: Looking For These T206 Murphy Batting Cards
author: wonkaticket

posts.post_title: Looking For These T206 Murphy Batting Cards
posts.post_content:
Looking for the following cards in VG-EX or better.

American Beauty 350 (no frame)
Cycle 460

Looking for these in any condition...

Red Hindu (Need)
Brown Lenox (Need?)
Drum (Upgrade)

Thanks in advance for you help. Happy to trade replace or buy any of the above you may have.

Cheers,

John

Bump

Still looking for these in VGEX or better.

Cycle 460
American Beauty 350 (No Frame)
Drum (Upgrade)

Have VG cards to give you in return for the above many dupes of Murphy as well. Will pay very, very well for any of the above 3.

Also if anyone can confirm the following that would be nice..my guess is none to date.

Brown Lenox
Red Hindu

If anyone knows of or can confirm I would even send you a free nice card for actual conformation of the 2 above.

Cheers,

John

Happy to see you back in action Wonkaticket.

I'll search my collection for ya (but I'm doubtful)

Best,
S

Thanks Scott for looking.

Cheers,

John

Still needing a VG-VGEX-EX or better for the AB350 and Cycle 460...please take advantage of me...its ok...I wont mind...:)

I wont leave you hanging either if it's your only Cycle 460 or AB350...
